alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 13 at 4:06PM EDT until May 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ARE EXPECTED TOMORROW ACROSS PORTIONS OF FAR WESTERN UPPER MICHIGAN... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF WESTERN UPPER MICHIGAN... The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Fire Weather Watch FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 002 Ontonagon...Fire Weather Zone 004 Baraga...Fire Weather Zone 009 Gogebic and Fire Weather Zone 084 Southern Houghton. * Winds...Southwest 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 20 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 60s. * Impacts...Burn restrictions are likely in effect. for more information on burn restrictions...visit the Michigan DNR website at http://www.michigan.gov/burnpermit...all lower case...or by calling 866-922-2876.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
